news_header: ON Semiconductor Corp. reported a 14.7% decline in revenue for Q4 2024, with EPS at $0.95, missing estimates.
news_original_title: Compared to Estimates, ON Semiconductor Corp. (ON) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
news_text: ON Semiconductor Corp. (ON) reported $1.72 billion in revenue for the quarter ended December 2024, reflecting a 14.7% decline year-over-year. The earnings per share (EPS) was $0.95, down from $1.25 a year ago. The revenue was 2.05% below the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.76 billion, and the EPS was 3.06% below the consensus estimate of $0.98. Investors are closely monitoring these metrics to gauge the company's financial health and stock performance.
